result.title: Invitation to CodeChef July LunchTime: LTIME26
result.content:
Hello Codeforces Community!

CodeChef invites you to participate in CodeChef July LunchTime at http://www.codechef.com/LTIME26. The 3 hour contest with 4 scrumptious problems from shef_2318 (Pavel Sheftelevich) will add the needed punch of excitement to your Sunday morning. So, note down the details of the contest and make sure to be there.

Contest Details:

Time: 26th July 2015 (1100 hrs) to 26th July 2015 (1400 hrs). (Indian Standard Time — +5:30 GMT) — Check your timezone.

Contest link: http://www.codechef.com/LTIME26

Registration: Just need to have a CodeChef handle to participate. For all those, who are interested, are requested to register in order to participate.

The problems have been tested by our new tester Z38 (Vlad Mosco), who makes his debut on CodeChef. Let’s give him a warm welcome. And for desert we will be having the elaborate and explanatory editorials from pkacprzak (Pawel Kacprzak). So, make sure to be there when the contest bell rings.

Prizes:

Top 10 performers in Global and Indian category will win a cool CodeChef T-shirt.

The contest promises to deliver on an interesting set of algorithmic problems with something for all. Good Luck! Hope to see you participating!!
